page.title: 07Places of Worship
page.content: {Parish Church St.Bartholomew Church of England Parish Priest: Michael Wilkinson Public Worship every Sunday at 8am 10am and 6pm. The Church building is open 9am 'till 5pm every weekday. The Church was built in the 14th century and rebuilt 1854. the altar is made of one slab of local green Kitley marble. There is John Crocker Brass,a saxon font and the village stocks. The tower houses 6 bells, the largest weighs 1/2 ton. {Yealmpton Methodist Church Methodist minister: Geoffrey Senior Sunday school - combined Church & Chapel, Wives Group - monthly meetings Wives village market - every Wednesday April to December, Mother & Toddler Group - Tuesday afternoons,handbell Ringers, Kings Youth Club weekly. { {Elim Pentecostal Group }meet weekly.
